## sensation: visual
### photoreceptor
- cone: fine detail, color vision 
  - 0도에 주로 분포(중심시) => 중앙이 선명하게 보임
- rods: low light, peripheral vision (동체 시력)
  - rhodopsin: light-sensitive pigment
  - 주변에 분포
- optic dist: blind spot
  - no photoreceptors

### light sensitivity
- cones: sensitive to bright light, photopic condition
- rods: sensitive to dim light, scotopic condition

### adaption
#### light
rhodopsin regeneration
adjust in bright light
disable rods

#### dark
rhodopsin breakdown
adjust in dim light
disable cones

#### purkinje shift

### color vision
cone cells detect color (hue, saturation, value) through photo-pigments(RGB 64:32:2, center of retina has no blue)

### color design
#### color patterns
- Monochromatic: one color
- Analogous: similar colors
- Compementary: opposite colors

### depth perception
- object centered cues: relative size, occlusion, linear perspective, motion parallax
- observer centered cues: binocular disparity
